entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
